plot outline: Tumi O Tumi is about the conflict between 'inner you' and 'outer you', an women faces all the time in her lifetime. It tells us how Gunjan, Sindur, Ashalata, three women from three different generations, struggle hard in order to set themselves free from all social compulsions redefining the true meaning of women empowerment. In the film, the stories of the three women, stuck between their family obligations and personal freedom.
title: Tumi O Tumi
plot: _Tumi O Tumi_ (qv) is about the conflict between 'inner you' and 'outer you', an women faces all the time in her lifetime.

_Tumi O Tumi_ (qv) is about the conflict between 'inner you' and 'outer you', an women faces all the time in her lifetime. It tells us how Gunjan, Sindur, Ashalata, three women from three different generations, struggle hard in order to set themselves free from all social compulsions redefining the true meaning of women empowerment. In the film, the stories of the three women, stuck between their family obligations and personal freedom.::Angel Digital Pvt Ltd
